description: Noticing Kirino has no one to share her hobbies with, Kyousuke asks for advice from his friend, Manami Tamura, who suggests that she make some otaku friends. Kirino joins an on-line community and is invited to an otaku tea party at a maid café in Akihabara.

titles.title: Je n`irai pas avec ma petite soeur dans ces réunions IRL
No es posible que vaya a un meeting con mi hermana
Ore ga Imouto to Off-Kai ni Iku Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way I`d Go to an IRL Meetup with My Sister
俺が妹とオフ会に行くわけがない
